title: Six-Day War
summary: The Six-Day War (Hebrew: מִלְחֶמֶת שֵׁשֶׁת הַיָּמִים‎, romanized: Miḥemet Šešet HaYamim; Arabic: النكسة‎, romanized: an-Naksah, lit. 'The Setback' or حرب 1967‎, Harb 1967, 'War of 1967'), also known as the June War, the 1967 Arab–Israeli War or the Third Arab–Israeli War, was an armed conflict fought from 5 to 10 June 1967 between Israel and an Arab coalition primarily comprising Jordan, Syria and UAR Egypt.
